ygData.msgSnippet: By the way Pokemon was not stupid. It had the same problem as that American Godzilla movie. It got to popular to fast and it burnt out early. Gradually

By the way Pokemon was not stupid. It had the same
problem as that American "Godzilla" movie. It got to
popular to fast and it burnt out early. Gradually
gaining popularity is why FF and Megaman are still
around.

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> OOC: Man, I held out with SEGA, and what did I get?
> I got stuck with the
> sucky Saturn system. My gut tells me that Nintendo
> is dead. GameCube is
> their last hurra. I plan on getting X-Box when the
> price comes down a
> bit. And X-Box is coming out with the sweet looking
> 'WWF Raw Is War'.
> Anyway I just wanted to add my 2 cents!
> 
> And yes the PS/PS2 WWF Smackdown series sucks!
>
